scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run start:dev:billing" "npm run start:dev:wallet" "npm run start:dev:expert-ranking" "npm run start:dev:aicore" "npm run start:dev:profiles" "npm run start:dev:bookings" "npm run start:dev:feedback" "npm run start:dev:posts" "npm run start:dev:authentication" "npm run start:dev:call-server" "npm run start:dev:messages" "npm run start:dev:notifications"
scripts.install:workspaces: npm install --workspace=billing && npm install --workspace=wallet && npm install --workspace=expert-ranking && npm install --workspace=aicore && npm install --workspace=profiles && npm install --workspace=bookings && npm install --workspace=feedback && npm install --workspace=posts && npm install --workspace=authentication && npm install --workspace=call-server && npm install --workspace=messages && npm install --workspace=notifications
